name: Abilify
description: abilify is used to treat the symptoms of psychotic conditions including schizophrenia in adults and children at least 13 years old.

name: Abilify Maintena
description: abilify maintena (aripiprazole) is a second-generation or atypical antipsychotic used to treat schizophrenia and bipolar i disorder. it is an extended-release injectable suspension of aripiprazole that only has to be given once a month.

name: Abiraterone
description: abiraterone is used together with steroid medication (prednisone or methylprednisolone) to treat prostate cancer that has spread to other parts of the body. abiraterone is used in men whose prostate cancer cannot be treated with surgery or other medicines.

name: Acetaminophen
description: acetaminophen is used to treat mild to moderate pain, moderate to severe pain in conjunction with opiates, or to reduce fever. common conditions treated include headache, muscle aches, arthritis, backache, toothaches, sore throat, colds, flu, and fevers.

name: Acetaminophen and Hydrocodone
description: acetaminophen and hydrocodone is a combination medicine used to relieve moderate to moderately severe pain.

name: Acetylcysteine
description: acetylcysteine is used to help prevent or lessen liver damage caused by taking large quantities of acetaminophen (tylenol).

name: Actos
description: actos is used together with diet and exercise to improve blood sugar control in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus.

name: Acyclovir
description: acyclovir is an antiviral drug that is used to treat symptoms of shingles, chickenpox, cold sores and genital herpes which are all caused by herpes viruses. it is also used to prevent having regular outbreaks of genital herpes. acyclovir will not get rid of the virus infection but does help sores heal faster and helps with pain relief.

name: Adderall
description: adderall is used to treat attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (adhd) and narcolepsy. adderall contains a combination of amphetamine and dextroamphetamine. amphetamine and dextroamphetamine are central nervous system stimulants that affect chemicals in the brain and nerves that contribute to hyperactivity and impulse control.

name: Adderall XR
description: adderall xr is a combination medicine used to treat attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (adhd).

name: Advair Diskus
description: advair diskus inhalation is a steroid and bronchodilator combination medicine that is used to prevent asthma attacks. it is also used to prevent flare-ups or worsening of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (copd) associated with chronic bronchitis and/or emphysema.

name: Advil
description: advil is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (nsaid). ibuprofen works by reducing hormones that cause inflammation and pain in the body.

name: Afinitor
description: afinitor is used to treat certain types of kidney cancer, breast cancer, or brain tumor. it is also used to treat certain types of advanced or progressive tumors of the stomach, intestines, or pancreas.

name: Aimovig
description: aimovig is a monoclonal antibody that blocks the activation of a certain protein that can produce a migraine attack. this protein, called calcitonin gene- related peptide (cgrp), can cause blood vessels to dilate and cause inflammation and migraine headache pain.

name: Ajovy
description: ajovy is an injectable prescription medicine used to prevent migraine headaches in adults.

name: Albuterol
description: albuterol inhalation is used to treat or prevent bronchospasm, or narrowing of the airways in the lungs, in people with asthma or certain types of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (copd). it is also used to prevent exercise-induced bronchospasm.

name: Alecensa
description: alecensa is used to treat a certain type of non-small cell lung cancer that has spread to other parts of the body.

name: Alendronate
description: alendronate is used to treat osteoporosis caused by menopause, steroid use, or gonadal failure.  alendronate is for use when you have a high risk of bone fracture due to osteoporosis.

name: Aleve
description: aleve is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (nsaid). naproxen works by reducing hormones that cause inflammation and pain in the body.

name: Alfuzosin
description: alfuzosin is an alpha-adrenergic (al-fa ad-ren-er-jk) blocker that is used to improve urination in men with benign prostatic hyperplasia (enlarged prostate).

name: Allegra
description: allegra is used to treat the symptoms of seasonal allergies (hay fever) in adults and children.

name: Allopurinol
description: allopurinol is used to treat gout or kidney stones.

name: Alprazolam
description: alprazolam is used to treat anxiety disorders, panic disorders, and anxiety caused by depression.

name: Alunbrig
description: alunbrig is used to treat non-small cell lung cancer that has spread to other parts of the body (metastatic).

name: Amantadine
description: amantadine is an antiviral medicine that blocks the actions of viruses in your body.

name: Ambien
description: ambien is used to treat insomnia. the immediate-release tablet is used to help you fall asleep when you first go to bed. the extended-release form, ambien cr, which has a first layer that dissolves quickly to help you fall asleep, and a second layer that dissolves slowly to help you stay asleep.

name: Amiodarone
description: amiodarone affects the rhythm of your heartbeats. it is used to help keep the heart beating normally in people with life-threatening heart rhythm disorders of the ventricles (the lower chambers of the heart that allow blood to flow out of the heart).

name: Amitriptyline
description: amitriptyline is a prescription medicine used to treat symptoms of depression.

name: Amlodipine
description: amlodipine is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension), some types of angina and other conditions caused by coronary artery disease. amlodipine is a calcium channel blocker that works by changing the movement of calcium in the heart and blood vessel cells. this widens the blood vessels which increases the blood and oxygen supply to the heart and also lowers blood pressure.

name: Amoxicillin
description: amoxicillin is used to treat many different types of infection caused by bacteria, such as tonsillitis, bronchitis, pneumonia, and infections of the ear, nose, throat, skin, or urinary tract.

name: Amoxicillin and Clavulanate
description: amoxicillin and clavulanate potassium is used to treat many different infections caused by bacteria, such as , pneumonia, ear infections, bronchitis, urinary tract infections, and infections of the skin.

name: Ampicillin
description: ampicillin is a penicillin antibiotic that is used to treat or prevent many different types of infections such as bladder infections, pneumonia, gonorrhea, meningitis, or infections of the stomach or intestines.

name: Anastrozole
description: anastrozole is used to treat breast cancer in postmenopausal women. it is often given to women whose cancer has progressed even after taking tamoxifen (nolvadex, soltamox).

name: AndroGel
description: androgel is used to treat conditions in men that result from a lack of natural testosterone.

name: Annovera
description: annovera is used by females as contraception to prevent pregnancy.

name: Apalutamide
description: apalutamide is used to treat prostate cancer that has spread to other parts of the body (metastatic) and is also being treated with another medicine or with surgery.

name: Apixaban
description: apixaban is used to lower the risk of stroke caused by a blood clot in people with a heart rhythm disorder called atrial fibrillation.

name: Apokyn
description: apokyn is a prescription medicine used to treat 'wearing-off' episodes (muscle stiffness, loss of muscle control) in people with advanced parkinson's disease.

name: Apriso
description: apriso affects a substance in the body that causes inflammation, tissue damage, and diarrhea.

name: Aptiom
description: aptiom is an anticonvulsant. it works by decreasing nerve impulses that cause seizures and pain.

name: Aricept
description: aricept is used to treat mild to moderate dementia caused by alzheimer's disease.

name: Arimidex
description: arimidex is used to treat breast cancer in postmenopausal women.

name: Aripiprazole
description: aripiprazole is an antipsychotic medicine that is used to treat schizophrenia in adults and children at least 13 years old.

name: Aristada
description: aristada is used to treat schizophrenia in adults.

name: Aromasin
description: aromasin is used to treat early and advanced breast cancer in postmenopausal women. early breast cancer is cancer that has not spread outside the breast. advanced breast cancer is cancer that has spread to other parts of the body.

name: Aspirin
description: aspirin is a salicylate (sa-lis-il-ate). it works by reducing substances in the body that cause pain, fever, and inflammation.

name: Atarax
description: atarax is used as a sedative to treat anxiety and tension. it is also used together with other medications given for anesthesia.

name: Atenolol
description: atenolol is used to treat angina (chest pain) and hypertension (high blood pressure).

name: Ativan
description: ativan is a prescription medicine used to treat anxiety disorders.

name: Atomoxetine
description: atomoxetine is used to treat attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (adhd).

name: Atorvastatin
description: atorvastatin is used together with diet to lower blood levels of 'bad' cholesterol (low-density lipoprotein, or ldl), to increase levels of 'good' cholesterol (high-density lipoprotein, or hdl), and to lower triglycerides (a type of fat in the blood).

name: Atropine
description: ophthalmic atropine, homatropine, and scopolamine are used to dilate (enlarge) the pupil of the eye. they are used before eye examinations, before and after eye surgery, and to treat certain eye conditions, such as uveitis or posterior synechiae.

name: Aubagio
description: aubagio is used to treat relapsing forms of multiple sclerosis in adults (including clinically isolated syndrome, relapsing-remitting disease, and active secondary progressive disease).

name: Augmentin
description: augmentin is prescription antibiotic used to treat many different infections caused by bacteria, such as , pneumonia, ear infections, bronchitis, urinary tract infections, and infections of the skin.

name: Austedo
description: austedo is used to treat involuntary muscle movements (chorea) caused by huntington's disease. deutetrabenazine is not a cure for huntington's disease and will not treat other symptoms of this condition.

name: Avsola
description: avsola (infliximab-axxq) is a monoclonal antibody drug used to treat certain inflammatory autoimmune diseases. avsola is a biological drug and one of four biosimilars of remicade (infliximab). biosimilars are highly similar versions of a drug that are designed to have the same effect, but they are not identical to the original version of the drug.

name: Azathioprine
description: azathioprine weakens your body's immune system, to help keep it from 'rejecting' a transplanted organ such as a kidney. organ rejection happens when the immune system treats the new organ as an invader and attacks it.

name: Azelastine
description: azelastine hydrochloride (hcl) nasal spray, 0.1% is indicated for the treatment of the symptoms of seasonal allergic rhinitis in adults and pediatric patients 5 years and older, and for the treatment of the symptoms of vasomotor rhinitis in adults and adolescent patients 12 years and older.

name: Azilect
description: azilect is used to treat symptoms of parkinson's disease (stiffness, tremors, spasms, poor muscle control).

name: Azithromycin
description: azithromycin is used to treat many different types of infections caused by bacteria, such as respiratory infections, skin infections, ear infections, eye infections, and sexually transmitted diseases.

name: Azulfidine
description: azulfidine is used to treat ulcerative colitis (uc), and to decrease the frequency of uc attacks. this medicine will not cure ulcerative colitis, but it can reduce the number of attacks you have.

name: Bacitracin
description: for the treatment of superficial ocular infections involving the conjunctiva and/or cornea caused by bacitracin susceptible organisms.

name: Baclofen
description: baclofen is used to treat muscle pain, spasms, and stiffness in people with multiple sclerosis or spinal cord injury or disease.

name: Bactrim
description: bactrim contains a combination of sulfamethoxazole and trimethoprim. sulfamethoxazole and trimethoprim are are both antibiotics that treat different types of infection caused by bacteria.

name: Bactrim DS
description: sulfamethoxazole and trimethoprim combination is used to treat infections including urinary tract infections, middle ear infections (otitis media), bronchitis, traveler's diarrhea, and shigellosis (bacillary dysentery). this medicine is also used to prevent or treat pneumocystis jiroveci pneumonia or pneumocystis carinii pneumonia (pcp), a very serious kind of pneumonia. this type of pneumonia occurs more commonly in patients whose immune systems are not working normally, including cancer patients, transplant patients, and patients with acquired immune deficiency syndrome (aids).

name: Bactroban
description: bactroban topical (for use on the skin) is used to treat skin infections such as impetigo or a 'staph' infection of the skin.

name: Balsalazide
description: the colazal brand of balsalazide is used to treat mild to moderate active ulcerative colitis in adults and children who are at least 5 years old.

name: Banzel
description: banzel is used together with other medicines to treat seizures caused by lennox-gastaut syndrome, a severe form of childhood epilepsy that also causes developmental and behavior problems.

name: Baqsimi
description: baqsimi nasal powder is a prescription medicine used to treat severe hypoglycemia (low blood sugar) in adult and children at least 4 years old.

name: Basaglar
description: basaglar is used to improve blood sugar control in adults and children with diabetes mellitus.

name: Bavencio
description: bavencio is used to treat a type of skin cancer called merkel cell carcinoma in adults and children at least 12 years old, when the cancer has spread to other parts of the body (metastatic).

name: Belbuca
description: belbuca buccal films are for around-the-clock treatment of moderate to severe chronic pain that is not controlled by other medicines.

name: Belsomra
description: belsomra is used to treat insomnia (trouble falling asleep or staying asleep).

name: Benadryl
description: benadryl is used to treat sneezing, runny nose, watery eyes, hives, skin rash, itching, and other cold or allergy symptoms.

name: Benazepril
description: benazepril is an ace inhibitor that is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension). lowering blood pressure may lower your risk of a stroke or heart attack.

name: Bendeka
description: bendeka is used to treat chronic lymphocytic leukemia. this medicine is also used to treat indolent b-cell non-hodgkin lymphoma after other medicines have been tried without successful treatment of this condition.

name: Benicar
description: benicar is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) in adults and children at least 6 years old.

name: Benlysta
description: benlysta is used together with other medicines to treat active systemic lupus erythematosus (sle). benlysta helps decrease disease activity more than when the other medicines are used alone.

name: Bentyl
description: bentyl is used to treat functional bowel or irritable bowel syndrome.

name: Benzonatate
description: benzonatate is used to relieve coughing.

name: Benztropine
description: benztropine is used with other medicines to treat symptoms of parkinson's disease, such as stiffness or tremors.

name: Berinert
description: berinert is a man-made form of a protein that occurs naturally in the blood stream and helps control swelling in the body. people with a condition called hereditary angioedema do not have enough of this protein. hereditary angioedema can cause attacks of swelling and symptoms such as stomach problems or trouble breathing.

name: Betamethasone
description: betamethasone is a highly potent steroid that prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation.

name: Bethanechol
description: bethanechol is used to treat urinary retention (trouble urinating) that may be caused by surgery, delivering a baby, or other conditions.

name: Bevacizumab
description: bevacizumab is used to treat a certain type of brain tumor, and certain types of cancers of the kidney, liver, lung, colon, rectum, cervix, ovary, or fallopian tube. bevacizumab is also used to treat cancer of the membrane lining the internal organs in your abdomen. it is usually given as part of a combination of cancer medicines.

name: Bicalutamide
description: bicalutamide is used to treat prostate cancer that has spread to other parts of the body (metastatic).

name: Biktarvy
description: biktarvy is used to treat hiv, the virus that can cause acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (aids).

name: Biotin
description: biotin has been used in alternative medicine as a likely effective aid in treating or preventing biotin deficiency. biotin deficiency can be caused by malnutrition, rapid weight loss, long-term tube feeding, and other medical conditions.

name: Bisacodyl
description: Known allergies to polyethylene glycol or other components of the kit Gastrointestinal (GI) obstruction Bowel perforation Toxic colitis Toxic megacolon Toxic megacolon

name: Bismuth subsalicylate
description: bismuth subsalicylate is used to treat diarrhea, nausea, heartburn, indigestion, gas, or upset stomach.

name: Bisoprolol
description: bisoprolol is used to treat hypertension (high blood pressure).

name: Black Cohosh
description: black cohosh is taken by some people to help with signs of menopause, like hot flashes.

name: Blincyto
description: blincyto is used to treat a certain type of acute lymphoblastic leukemia in adults and children.

name: Boniva
description: boniva is prescription medicine used to treat or prevent osteoporosis in women after menopause. ibandronate helps increase bone mass and helps reduce the chance of having a spinal fracture.

name: Botox
description: botox injections are used to soften facial wrinkles, to prevent chronic migraines, excessive sweating, cervical dystonia, spasticity, some eye muscle conditions and treat urinary leakage caused by an overactive bladder. botox injections work by relaxing muscles by blocking signals that make muscles contract.

name: Breo Ellipta
description: breo ellipta inhalation powder contains a combination of fluticasone and vilanterol. fluticasone is a steroid that prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation. vilanterol is a bronchodilator that works by relaxing muscles in the airways to improve breathing.

name: Breztri Aerosphere
description: do not use breztri aerosphere if you are allergic to budesonide, glycopyrrolate, formoterol, or any of the other ingredients. see what are the ingredients in breztri aerosphere? at the end of this page for a complete list of ingredients.

name: Brilinta
description: brilinta is used to lower your risk of heart attack, stroke, or death due to a blocked artery or a prior heart attack.

name: Brimonidine
description: brimonidine tartrate ophthalmic solution, 0.2% may be used concomitantly with other topical ophthalmic drug products to lower intraocular pressure. if more than one topical ophthalmic product is being used, the products should be administered at least 5 minutes apart.

name: Briviact
description: briviact is used to treat partial onset seizures in people with epilepsy.

name: Bromocriptine
description: the parlodel brand of bromocriptine is used to treat certain conditions caused by a hormone imbalance in which there is too much prolactin in the blood (hyperprolactinemia). high prolactin levels may cause sexual problems, hot flashes, menstrual problems or infertility in women, muscle loss in men, breast enlargement in men and women, and lack of sexual development in adolescents. parlodel is also used to treat these disorders when they are caused by a noncancerous tumor of the pituitary gland that can overproduce prolactin.

name: Brukinsa
description: brukinsa (zanubrutinib) is a prescription medicine used to treat certain types of b-cell lymphoma.

name: Bryhali
description: bryhali (for the skin) is used to treat inflammation and itching caused by plaque psoriasis or skin conditions that respond to steroid medication.

name: Budesonide
description: entocort and ortikos are used to treat mild to moderate crohn's disease in adults and children at least 8 years old. these medicines are also used in adults to keep symptoms from returning for up to 3 months.

name: Bumetanide
description: bumetanide belongs to a group of medicines called loop diuretics or 'water pills.' bumetanide is given to help treat fluid retention (edema) and swelling that is caused by congestive heart failure, liver disease, kidney disease, or other medical conditions. it works by acting on the kidneys to increase the flow of urine .

name: Bumex
description: bumetanide belongs to a group of medicines called loop diuretics or 'water pills.' bumetanide is given to help treat fluid retention (edema) and swelling that is caused by congestive heart failure, liver disease, kidney disease, or other medical conditions. it works by acting on the kidneys to increase the flow of urine .

name: Bunavail
description: bunavail buccal films contains a combination of buprenorphine and naloxone. buprenorphine is an opioid medication, sometimes called a narcotic. naloxone blocks the effects of opioid medication, including pain relief or feelings of well-being that can lead to opioid abuse.

name: Bupivacaine
description: bupivacaine is an anesthetic (numbing medicine) that is used as a local (in only one area) anesthetic.

name: Buprenex
description: buprenex is an opioid medicine used to treat pain. an opioid is sometimes called a narcotic.

name: Buprenorphine
description: buprenorphine is an opioid medication. buprenorphine sublingual tablets (given under the tongue) are a prescription medicine used to treat opioid addiction (either prescription or illegal drugs), as part of a complete treatment program that also includes counseling and behavioral therapy.

name: Buprenorphine & Naloxone
description: buprenorphine and naloxone is a combination medicine used to treat opioid addiction. buprenorphine and naloxone is not for use as a pain medication.

name: Bupropion
description: bupropion is an antidepressant medication that treats major depressive disorder (mdd), seasonal affective disorder (sad) and is used to help people to quit smoking.� it is thought to work by changing levels of certain chemicals in the brain.

name: Buspar
description: buspar is used to treat anxiety disorders or the symptoms of anxiety, such as fear, tension, irritability, dizziness, pounding heartbeat, and other physical symptoms.

name: Buspirone
description: buspirone is used to treat symptoms of anxiety, such as fear, tension, irritability, dizziness, pounding heartbeat, and other physical symptoms.

name: Bystolic
description: bystolic is used to treat hypertension (high blood pressure). lowering blood pressure may lower your risk of a stroke or heart attack.

name: Cabenuva
description: the cabenuva injection kit contains cabotegravir and rilpivirine is separate single-dose vials. cabotegravir and rilpivirine are antiviral medicines that prevent human immunodeficiency virus (hiv) from multiplying in your body. hiv is the virus that can cause acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (aids).

name: Cabometyx
description: cabometyx is used to treat advanced kidney cancer, sometimes in combination with another medicine called nivolumab.

name: Calcitriol
description: calcitriol is used to treat hyperparathyroidism (overactive parathyroid glands) and metabolic bone disease in people who have chronic kidney failure and are not receiving dialysis.

name: Calcium carbonate
description: calcium carbonate is used to prevent or to treat a calcium deficiency.

name: Calquence
description: calquence is used to treat mantle cell lymphoma (a type of non-hodgkin lymphoma) in adults. this medicine is given after other treatments have failed.

name: Canasa
description: canasa (mesalamine) is a suppository used to treat a type of inflammatory bowel disease called ulcerative proctitis. ulcerative proctitis causes inflammation, redness and ulcers to develop in the lining of the rectum, which is at the end of your large intestine. ulcerative proctitis may also affect nearby parts of the colon.

name: Candesartan
description: candesartan is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) in adults and children who are at least 1 year old. lowering blood pressure may lower your risk of a stroke or heart attack.

name: Caplyta
description: caplyta is a once-daily capsule used to control the symptoms of schizophrenia in adults.

name: Captopril
description: captopril is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension), congestive heart failure, kidney problems caused by diabetes, and to improve survival after a heart attack.

name: Carbamazepine
description: carbamazepine is an anticonvulsant. it works by decreasing nerve impulses that cause seizures and nerve pain, such as trigeminal neuralgia and diabetic neuropathy.

name: Carbidopa and levodopa
description: carbidopa and levodopa is a combination medicine used to treat symptoms of parkinson's disease, such as stiffness or tremors.

name: Carvedilol
description: carvedilol is used to treat heart failure and hypertension (high blood pressure). it is also used after a heart attack that has caused your heart not to pump as well.

name: Casodex
description: casodex is used to treat prostate cancer that has spread to other parts of the body (metastatic).

name: Cefdinir
description: cefdinir is a cephalosporin (sef a low spor in) antibiotic that is used to treat many different types of infections caused by bacteria.

name: Cefixime
description: cefixime is an antibiotic that may be used to treat many different types of infections caused by bacteria.

name: Ceftriaxone
description: to reduce the development of drug-resistant bacteria and maintain the effectiveness of ceftriaxone for injection, and other antibacterial drugs, ceftriaxone for injection should be used only to treat or prevent infections that are proven or strongly suspected to be caused by bacteria.

name: Cefuroxime
description: cefuroxime is used to treat bacterial infections in many different parts of the body. it belongs to the class of medicines known as cephalosporin antibiotics. it works by killing bacteria or preventing their growth. however, cefuroxime will not work for colds, flu, or other virus infections.

name: Celebrex
description: celebrex is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (nsaid). it works by reducing hormones that cause inflammation and pain in the body.

name: Celecoxib
description: celecoxib is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (nsaid). it works by reducing hormones that cause inflammation and pain in the body.

name: Celexa
description: celexa is a prescription medicine used to treat depression.

name: Cephalexin
description: cephalexin is used to treat infections caused by bacteria, including upper respiratory infections, ear infections, skin infections, urinary tract infections and bone infections.

name: Cequa
description: cequa is used to treat chronic dry eye that may be caused by inflammation.

name: Cetirizine
description: cetirizine is used to treat cold or allergy symptoms such as sneezing, itching, watery eyes, or runny nose.

name: Chlorthalidone
description: chlorthalidone is a thiazide diuretic (water pill) that helps prevent your body from absorbing too much salt, which can cause fluid retention.

name: Cholecalciferol
description: cholecalciferol is used as a dietary supplement in people who do not get enough vitamin d in their diets to maintain adequate health.

name: Cialis
description: cialis is used to treat erectile dysfunction (impotence) and symptoms of benign prostatic hypertrophy (enlarged prostate).

name: Cimzia
description: cimzia reduces the effects of a substance in the body that can cause inflammation.

name: Cinryze
description: cinryze is a man-made form of a protein that occurs naturally in the blood stream and helps control swelling in the body. people with a condition called hereditary angioedema do not have enough of this protein. hereditary angioedema can cause attacks of swelling and symptoms such as stomach problems or trouble breathing.

name: Cipro
description: cipro is used to treat different types of bacterial infections. cipro is also used to treat people who have been exposed to anthrax or certain types of plague.

name: Ciprofloxacin
description: ciprofloxacin is a fluoroquinolone (flor-o-kwin-o-lone) antibiotic, it is used to treat different types of bacterial infections. it is also used to treat people who have been exposed to anthrax or certain types of plague. ciprofloxacin extended-release is only approved for use in adults.

name: Citalopram
description: citalopram is a prescription medicine used to treat depression.

name: Clarithromycin
description: clarithromycin is used to treat many different types of bacterial infections affecting the skin and respiratory system.

name: Claritin
description: claritin is used to treat sneezing, runny nose, watery eyes, hives, skin rash, hay fever, itching, and other cold or allergy symptoms.

name: Clindamycin
description: clindamycin is used to treat serious infections caused by bacteria.

name: Clobetasol
description: clobetasol topical (for the skin) is used to treat inflammation and itching caused by plaque psoriasis and skin conditions that respond to corticosteroid medication.

name: Clobex
description: clobex (for the skin) is used to treat inflammation and itching caused by plaque psoriasis or skin conditions that respond to steroid medication.

name: Clodan
description: clodan (for the skin) is used to treat inflammation and itching caused by plaque psoriasis or skin conditions that respond to steroid medication.

name: Clonazepam
description: clonazepam is used to treat certain seizure disorders (including absence seizures or lennox-gastaut syndrome) in adults and children.

name: Clonidine
description: clonidine is used to treat hypertension (high blood pressure).

name: Clopidogrel
description: clopidogrel is used to lower your risk of having a stroke, blood clot, or serious heart problem after you've had a heart attack, severe chest pain (angina), or circulation problems.

name: Clotrimazole
description: clotrimazole is used to treat and prevent yeast infections of the mouth and throat in adults and children older than 3 years.

name: Codeine
description: codeine is an opioid pain reliever which is used to treat mild to moderately severe pain and to help reduce coughing. codeine is available as a single ingredient tablet and also available in multi ingredients products combined with other pain relieving medicines or cold and flu medicines.

name: Colace
description: colace is used to treat or prevent occasional constipation, and to reduce pain or rectal damage caused by hard stools or by straining during bowel movements.

name: Colazal
description: the colazal brand of balsalazide is used to treat mild to moderate active ulcerative colitis in adults and children who are at least 5 years old.

name: Colchicine
description: because colchicine was developed prior to federal regulations requiring fda review of all marketed drug products, not all uses for colchicine have been approved by the fda.

name: Concerta
description: concerta extended-release tablets are used to treat attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (adhd) in children 6 years of age and older, adolescents, and in adults up to the age of 65.

name: Coreg
description: coreg is used to treat heart failure and hypertension (high blood pressure).

name: Cosentyx
description: cosentyx is an immunosuppressant that reduces the effects of a chemical substance in the body that can cause inflammation.

name: Coumadin
description: coumadin is used to treat or prevent blood clots in veins or arteries, which can reduce the risk of stroke, heart attack, or other serious conditions.

name: Crestor
description: crestor belongs to a a group of drugs called hmg coa reductase inhibitors, or 'statins.' rosuvastatin is used together with diet to lower blood levels of 'bad' cholesterol (low-density lipoprotein, or ldl), to increase levels of 'good' cholesterol (high-density lipoprotein, or hdl), and to lower triglycerides (a type of fat in the blood).

name: Cyanocobalamin
description: cyanocobalamin is used to treat vitamin b12 deficiency in people with pernicious anemia or other conditions such as folic acid deficiency, pregnancy, thyroid problems, stomach and intestinal disorders, bleeding, liver or kidney disease, parasite infection, or cancer.

name: Cyclobenzaprine
description: cyclobenzaprine is a muscle relaxant. it works by blocking nerve impulses (or pain sensations) that are sent to your brain. cyclobenzaprine is used together with rest and physical therapy to treat skeletal muscle conditions such as pain or injury.

name: Cymbalta
description: cymbalta is used to treat major depressive disorder in adults. it is also used to treat general anxiety disorder in adults and children who are at least 7 years old.

name: Dabigatran
description: dabigatran is used to lower the risk of stroke caused by a blood clot in people with a heart rhythm disorder called atrial fibrillation.  dabigatran is used when the atrial fibrillation is not caused by a heart valve problem.

name: Dapagliflozin
description: dapagliflozin is a prescription medication that is mainly used alongside diet and exercise to help treat type 2 diabetes, but it is also used in the treatment of heart failure. it was first approved by the us food and drug administration (fda) in 2014.

name: Darzalex
description: darzalex is used to treat multiple myeloma (bone marrow cancer).

name: Dayvigo
description: treatment for:�insomnia

name: Decadron
description: decadron is a steroid that prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation.

name: Degarelix
description: degarelix injection is used to treat prostate cancer. it works by decreasing the amount of testosterone in the body, which the tumor needs to grow.

name: Delzicol
description: delzicol (mesalamine) belongs to a class of drugs called aminosalicylates, which are used to treat gut inflammation. it helps to treat and prevent flare-ups of ulcerative colitis, a type of inflammatory bowel disease (ibd). ulcerative colitis is an autoimmune disorder, which means that your own immune system attacks your gut, causing swelling and ulcers in your colon and rectum.

name: Demerol
description: demerol is a strong prescription pain medicine that is used to manage the relief short-term pain, when other pain treatments such as non-opioid pain medicines do not treat your pain well enough or you cannot tolerate them.

name: Denosumab
description: the prolia brand of denosumab is used to treat osteoporosis or bone loss in men and women who have a high risk of bone fracture. prolia is sometimes used in people whose bone fracture is caused by certain medicines or cancer treatments.

name: Depakote
description: depakote affects chemicals in the body that may be involved in causing seizures. depakote is used to treat various types of seizure disorders. this medicine is sometimes used together with other seizure medications.

name: Depo-Provera
description: depo-provera is a form of progesterone, a female hormone that prevents ovulation (the release of an egg from an ovary). medroxyprogesterone also causes changes in your cervical mucus and uterine lining, making it harder for sperm to reach the uterus and harder for a fertilized egg to attach to the uterus.

name: Descovy
description: use descovy as ordered by your doctor. read all information given to you. follow all instructions closely.

name: Desloratadine
description: desloratadine is an antihistamine that is used to treat the symptoms of allergies, such as sneezing, watery eyes, itching, and runny nose.

name: Desmopressin
description: desmopressin is used to treat nighttime bed-wetting, central diabetes insipidus, and increased thirst and urination caused by head surgery or head trauma.

name: Desvenlafaxine
description: desvenlafaxine is used to treat major depressive disorder.

name: Desyrel
description: desyrel is an antidepressant that is used to treat major depressive disorder.

name: Detrol
description: detrol is a prescription medicine used to treat symptoms of overactive bladder in adults, including:

name: Dexamethasone
description: dexamethasone is a corticosteroid that prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation.

name: Dexamethasone Intensol
description: dexamethasone provides relief for inflamed areas of the body. it is used to treat a number of different conditions, such as inflammation (swelling), severe allergies, adrenal problems, arthritis, asthma, blood or bone marrow problems, kidney problems, skin conditions, and flare-ups of multiple sclerosis. dexamethasone is a corticosteroid (cortisone-like medicine or steroid). it works on the immune system to help relieve swelling, redness, itching, and allergic reactions.

name: Dexilant
description: dexilant is used to treat heartburn caused by gastroesophageal reflux disease (gerd), and to heal erosive esophagitis (damage to the esophagus from stomach acid).

name: Dextroamphetamine
description: dextroamphetamine is used to treat narcolepsy and attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (adhd).

name: Dextromethorphan
description: dextromethorphan is used to treat a cough. it is available over-the-counter alone and is also present in many over-the-counter and prescription combination medications.

name: Diacomit
description: diacomit is a prescription medicine used to treat seizures associated with dravet syndrome. dravet syndrome is a rare chronic form of epilepsy that begins in the first year of life and causes frequent or prolonged seizures.

name: Diastat
description: diastat acudial is a rectal gel used to treat seizures in people with epilepsy. diastat acudial contains the medication diazepam, which belongs to a class of drugs called benzodiazepine anticonvulsant medications.

name: Diazepam
description: diazepam is used to treat anxiety disorders, or alcohol withdrawal symptoms.

name: Diclofenac
description: diclofenac is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (nsaid). this medicine works by reducing substances in the body that cause pain and inflammation.

name: Dicyclomine
description: dicyclomine is used to treat functional bowel or irritable bowel syndrome.

name: Diflucan
description: diflucan is used to treat infections caused by fungus, which can invade any part of the body including the mouth, throat, esophagus, lungs, bladder, genital area, and the blood.

name: Digoxin
description: digoxin is used to treat heart failure.

name: Dilantin
description: dilantin is an anti-epileptic drug, also called an anticonvulsant. it works by slowing down impulses in the brain that cause seizures.

name: Dilaudid
description: dilaudid is used to treat moderate to severe pain.

name: Diltiazem
description: diltiazem is used to treat hypertension (high blood pressure), angina (chest pain), and certain heart rhythm disorders.

name: Dimenhydrinate
description: dimenhydrinate is used to treat or prevent nausea, vomiting, and dizziness associated with motion sickness.

name: Diovan
description: diovan is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) in adults and children who are at least 1 year old. lowering blood pressure may lower your risk of a stroke or heart attack.

name: Dipentum
description: dipentum is used to treat ulcerative colitis.

name: Diphenhydramine
description: diphenhydramine is used to treat sneezing, runny nose, watery eyes, hives, skin rash, itching, and other cold or allergy symptoms.

name: Diprolene
description: betamethasone is a highly potent steroid that prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation.

name: Ditropan
description: ditropan xl is used to treat symptoms of overactive bladder, such as frequent or urgent urination, incontinence (urine leakage), and increased night-time urination.

name: Divalproex sodium
description: divalproex sodium comes in different pill forms that are for different uses.

name: Docusate Sodium
description: do not use

name: Donepezil
description: donepezil is used to help improve mental function in people with alzheimer's disease.

name: Dopamine
description: dopamine injection (intropin) is used to treat certain conditions that occur when you are in shock, which may be caused by heart attack, trauma, surgery, heart failure, kidney failure, and other serious medical conditions.

name: Doxazosin
description: doxazosin is used to treat hypertension (high blood pressure), or to improve urination in men with benign prostatic hyperplasia (enlarged prostate).

name: Doxepin
description: antidepressants increased the risk of suicidal thinking and behavior in children, adolescents, and young adults in short-term studies with major depressive disorder (mdd) and other psychiatric disorders. short term studies did not show an increase in the risk of suicidality with antidepressants compared to placebo in adults beyond age 24, and there was a reduction in risk with antidepressants compared with placebo in adults aged 65 or older. this risk must be balanced with the clinical need. monitor patients closely for clinical worsening, suicidality, or unusual changes in behavior. families and caregivers should be advised of the need for close observation and communication with the prescriber. not approved for use in pediatric patients .

name: Doxycycline
description: doxycycline is used to treat many different bacterial infections, such as acne, urinary tract infections, intestinal infections, respiratory infections, eye infections, gonorrhea, chlamydia, syphilis, periodontitis (gum disease), and others. doxycycline works by stopping the growth of bacteria when treating bacterial infections and is also thought to have an anti-inflammatory action when used for other conditions. doxycycline is a tetracycline antibiotic.

name: Dulcolax
description: dulcolax is used to treat constipation or to empty the bowels before surgery, colonoscopy, x-rays, or other intestinal medical procedure.

name: Duloxetine
description: duloxetine is used to treat major depressive disorder in adults. it is also used to treat general anxiety disorder in adults and children who are at least 7 years old.

name: Duopa
description: duopa is used to treat movement problems in people with advanced parkinson's disease. duopa reduces the 'off time' effect associated with taking other medicines to treat parkinson's symptoms.

name: Dupixent
description: dupixent is used to treat moderate-to-severe eczema (atopic dermatitis) that cannot be controlled with topical medicines applied to the skin. it is used for eczema in adults and children who are at least 6 months old.

name: Dutasteride
description: dutasteride is used to treat benign prostatic hyperplasia (bph) in men with an enlarged prostate. dutasteride helps improve urinary flow and may also reduce your need for prostate surgery later on.

name: Echinacea
description: echinacea has been used in alternative medicine as a possibly effective aid in treating the common cold, or vaginal yeast infections.

name: Ecotrin
description: ecotrin is a salicylate (sa-lis-il-ate) that is used to treat pain, and reduce fever or inflammation.

name: Effexor
description: antidepressants increased the risk compared to placebo of suicidal thinking and behavior (suicidality) in children, adolescents, and young adults in short-term studies of major depressive disorder (mdd) and other psychiatric disorders. anyone considering the use of effexor or any other antidepressant in a child, adolescent, or young adult must balance this risk with the clinical need. short-term studies did not show an increase in the risk of suicidality with antidepressants compared to placebo in adults beyond age 24; there was a reduction in risk with antidepressants compared to placebo in adults aged 65 and older. depression and certain other psychiatric disorders are themselves associated with increases in the risk of suicide. patients of all ages who are started on antidepressant therapy should be monitored appropriately and observed closely for clinical worsening, suicidality, or unusual changes in behavior. families and caregivers should be advised of the need for close observation and communication with the prescriber. effexor is not approved for use in pediatric patients. (see warnings: clinical worsening and suicide risk, precautions: information for patients, and precautions: pediatric use)

name: Effexor XR
description: effexor xr is a prescription medicine used in adults to treat major depressive disorder, generalized anxiety disorder (gad), social anxiety disorder (sad), and panic disorder.

name: Elagolix
description: elagolix belongs to a class of drugs called gonadotropin-releasing hormone (gnrh) receptor antagonist. it is an oral tablet used to help treat pain caused by endometriosis.

name: Elavil
description: elavil is a prescription medicine used to treat symptoms of depression.

name: Eligard
description: eligard overstimulates the body's own production of certain hormones, which causes that production to shut down temporarily. leuprolide reduces the amount of testosterone in men or estrogen in women.

name: Eliquis
description: eliquis is used to lower the risk of stroke or a blood clot in people with a heart rhythm disorder called atrial fibrillation.

name: Emgality
description: emgality is a prescription medicine used to prevent migraine headaches in adults.

name: Empagliflozin
description: empagliflozin is used together with diet and exercise to improve blood sugar control in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus.

name: Empaveli
description: empaveli is a prescription medicine used to treat adults with a disease called paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria (pnh). it is not known if empaveli is safe and effective in children.

name: Emtricitabine
description: emtricitabine is used to treat hiv, the virus that can cause acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (aids). emtricitabine is not a cure for hiv or aids.

name: Enalapril
description: enalapril is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) in adults and children who are at least 1 month old.

name: Enbrel
description: enbrel is used to treat rheumatoid arthritis, psoriatic arthritis, or ankylosing spondylitis, and to prevent joint damage caused by these conditions.

name: Enoxaparin
description: enoxaparin is used to treat or prevent a type of blood clot called deep vein thrombosis (dvt), which can lead to blood clots in the lungs (pulmonary embolism). a dvt can occur after certain types of surgery, or in people who are bed-ridden due to a prolonged illness.

name: Entresto
description: entresto is used in adults with chronic heart failure. this medicine helps lower the risk of needing to be hospitalized when symptoms get worse, and helps lower the risk of death from heart failure.

name: Entyvio
description: entyvio reduces the effects of a substance in the body that can cause inflammation.

name: Enzalutamide
description: enzalutamide is a prescription medicine used to treat prostate cancer in men who have received surgery or hormone therapy to lower testosterone.

name: Epclusa
description: epclusa is used to treat chronic hepatitis c in adults and children 3 years of age and older (dosage is based on weight). it is sometimes given in combination with another antiviral medicine called ribavirin in people who also have advanced cirrhosis.

name: Ephedrine
description: ephedrine is used for temporary relief of shortness of breath, chest tightness, and wheezing due to bronchial asthma. ephedrine may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.

name: Epidiolex
description: epidiolex is a prescription medicine used to treat seizures in people with lennox-gastaut syndrome, dravet syndrome, or tuberous sclerosis complex.

name: EpiPen
description: epipen auto-injectors are used to treat severe allergic reactions (anaphylaxis) to insect stings or bites, foods, drugs, and other allergens.

name: Eplerenone
description: eplerenone is used to lower the risk of death from heart failure after a heart attack.

name: Ergocalciferol
description: ergocalciferol is used to treat hypoparathyroidism (decreased functioning of the parathyroid glands).

name: Erleada
description: erleada is used to treat prostate cancer that has spread to other parts of the body (metastatic) and is also being treated with another medicine or with surgery.

name: Ertapenem
description: ertapenem is an antibiotic that is used to treat severe infections caused by bacteria in the skin, lungs, stomach, pelvis, and urinary tract.

name: Erythromycin
description: erythromycin is used to treat or prevent many different types of infections caused by bacteria.

name: Erythromycin ophthalmic
description: erythromycin ophthalmic (for the eyes) is used to treat bacterial infections of the eyes.

name: Escitalopram
description: escitalopram is used to treat major depressive disorder in adults and adolescents at least 12 years old.

name: Esomeprazole
description: esomeprazole is used to treat symptoms of gastroesophageal reflux disease (gerd) and other conditions involving excessive stomach acid such as zollinger-ellison syndrome. esomeprazole is also used to promote healing of erosive esophagitis (damage to your esophagus caused by stomach acid).

name: Estrace
description: estrace is used to treat menopause symptoms such as hot flashes and vaginal changes, and to prevent osteoporosis (bone loss) in menopausal women, and to replace estrogen in women with ovarian failure or other conditions that cause a lack of natural estrogen in the body.

name: Estradiol
description: estradiol is used to treat menopause symptoms such as hot flashes and vaginal changes, and to prevent osteoporosis (bone loss) in menopausal women. estradiol is also used to treat low estrogen levels in women with ovarian failure. it is also indicated to treat certain types of breast cancer and prostate cancer.

name: Eszopiclone
description: eszopiclone is a sedative that is used to treat insomnia.  eszopiclone causes relaxation to help you fall asleep and stay asleep.

name: Etanercept
description: etanercept is a tumor necrosis factor (tnf) blocker that is used in adults to prevent joint damage caused by rheumatoid arthritis, psoriatic arthritis, or ankylosing spondylitis.

name: Etodolac
description: etodolac is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (nsaid). it works by reducing hormones that cause inflammation and pain in the body.

name: Eulexin
description: liver failure has been reported in patients taking flutamide. evidence of hepatic injury occurred usually within the first 3 months and included elevated serum transaminase levels, jaundice, hepatic encephalopathy, and death related to acute hepatic failure. serum transaminase levels should be measured prior to starting treatment, monthly for the first 4 months of therapy, and periodically thereafter. flutamide is not recommended in patients whose alt values exceed twice the upper limit of normal and should be discontinued if the alt rises above 2 times the upper limit of normal or jaundice occurs during therapy .

name: Euthyrox
description: euthyrox treats hypothyroidism (low thyroid hormone).

name: Evenity
description: evenity is a prescription medicine used to treat osteoporosis in postmenopausal women with a high risk of bone fracture who cannot use other osteoporosis medications (or when other medications did not work).

name: Everolimus
description: everolimus (afinitor, afinitor disperz, zortress) belongs to a class of drugs called kinase inhibitors. it is used to prevent organ transplant rejection and treat certain benign (noncancerous) and cancerous tumors.

name: Evista
description: evista is used to treat or prevent osteoporosis in postmenopausal women. evista is also used to reduce the risk of invasive breast cancer in postmenopausal women who have osteoporosis or who are otherwise at risk of invasive breast cancer.

name: Evusheld
description: the monoclonal antibodies in evusheld work by binding to the spike protein on sars-cov-2, the virus that causes covid-19. this blocks the virus from being able to bind to ace2 receptors, which is what enables the virus to invade your cells.

name: Excedrin
description: excedrin contains a combination of acetaminophen, aspirin, and caffeine. acetaminophen is a pain reliever and a fever reducer. aspirin is in a group of drugs called salicylates. it works by reducing substances in the body that cause pain, fever, and inflammation. caffeine is a central nervous system stimulant. it relaxes muscle contractions in blood vessels to improve blood flow.

name: Excedrin Migraine
description: excedrin migraine contains a combination of acetaminophen, aspirin, and caffeine. acetaminophen is a pain reliever and a fever reducer. aspirin is in a group of drugs called salicylates (sa-lis-il-ates). it works by reducing substances in the body that cause pain, fever, and inflammation. caffeine is a central nervous system stimulant. it relaxes muscle contractions in blood vessels to improve blood flow.

name: Exemestane
description: exemestane (aromasin) is a third-generation aromatase inhibitor used to treat hormone responsive breast cancers in women who are postmenopausal - have gone through menopause.

name: Ezetimibe
description: ezetimibe is a medicine used to lower cholesterol in people who have high blood cholesterol. ezetimibe works by reducing the amount of cholesterol your body absorbs from your intestines. high cholesterol can cause fatty deposits to form in your blood vessels which increases your risk of heart disease.

name: Famotidine
description: famotidine is used to treat and prevent ulcers in the stomach and intestines. it also treats conditions in which the stomach produces too much acid, such as zollinger-ellison syndrome.

name: Farxiga
description: farxiga is used together with diet and exercise to improve blood sugar control in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus. this medicine is not for treating type 1 diabetes.

name: Fasenra
description: fasenra injection is a prescription medicine used together with other asthma medicines to help control severe asthma in adults and children who are at least 12 years old.

name: Faslodex
description: faslodex is an anti-estrogen medication. it works by blocking the actions of estrogen in the body. certain types of breast cancer use estrogen to grow and multiply in the body.

name: Febuxostat
description: febuxostat reduces the production of uric acid in your body. a build-up of uric acid can cause gout symptoms.

name: Felodipine
description: felodipine is a calcium channel blocker that is used to treat hypertension (high blood pressure) in adults. lowering blood pressure can help lower your risk of a stroke or heart attack.

name: Femara
description: femara is used to treat breast cancer in postmenopausal women. it is often given to women who have been taking tamoxifen (nolvadex, soltamox) for 5 years.

name: Fenofibrate
description: fenofibrate is a medicine used with a cholesterol reducing diet to lower high cholesterol and high triglyceride (fatty acid) levels in the blood.� it works by increasing the breaking down and removal of triglycerides from the blood.�the effect of fenofibrate on cardiovascular disease progression and symptoms, and both non-cardiovascular and cardiovascular deaths has not yet been established.

name: Fentanyl
description: fentanyl is a synthetic opioid medicine used to treat moderate to severe pain, it is up to 100 times stronger than other opioids like morphine, heroin or oxycodone. fentanyl is from the class of medicines called narcotic analgesics.

name: Ferrous gluconate
description: ferrous gluconate is used to treat or prevent iron deficiency anemia (a lack of red blood cells caused by having too little iron in the body).

name: Ferrous Sulfate
description: ferrous sulfate is used to treat iron deficiency anemia (a lack of red blood cells caused by having too little iron in the body).

name: Fexofenadine
description: fexofenadine is an antihistamine that may be used to treat allergy symptoms (including hay fever) in adults and children.

name: Finasteride
description: finasteride (proscar) is used alone or with other medication to treat symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia (bph) in men with enlarged prostate.

name: Fintepla
description: fintepla can cause serious side effects, including:

name: Fioricet
description: fioricet is used to treat tension headaches that are caused by muscle contractions.

name: Firazyr
description: firazyr is used to treat attacks of hereditary angioedema (an immune system disorder) in adults.

name: Firmagon
description: firmagon injection is used to treat prostate cancer. it works by decreasing the amount of testosterone in the body, which the tumor needs to grow.

name: Fish Oil
description: fish oil are used together with diet and exercise to help lower triglyceride levels in the blood.

name: Flagyl
description: flagyl is an antibiotic that is used to treat bacterial infections of the vagina, stomach, liver, skin, joints, brain and spinal cord, lungs, heart, or bloodstream.

name: Flecainide
description: flecainide is a class ic anti-arrhythmic that is used in certain situations to prevent serious heart rhythm disorders.

name: Flexeril
description: flexeril is used together with rest and physical therapy to treat skeletal muscle conditions such as pain, injury, or spasms.

name: Flomax
description: flomax is used to improve urination in men with benign prostatic hyperplasia (enlarged prostate).

name: Flonase
description: flonase is a nasal spray containing fluticasone propionate. fluticasone propionate is a corticosteroid that prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation.

name: Flovent
description: flovent is a corticosteroid. it prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation.

name: Flovent HFA
description: flovent hfa is a steroid that is used to prevent asthma attacks in adults and children. this medicine is sometimes used together with steroid medicine taken by mouth.

name: Fluconazole
description: fluconazole is an antifungal medicine that is used to treat infections caused by fungus, which can invade any part of the body including the mouth, throat, esophagus, lungs, bladder, genital area, and the blood.

name: Fludrocortisone
description: fludrocortisone is used to treat conditions in which the body does not produce enough of its own steroids, such as addison's disease, and salt-losing adrenogenital syndrome.

name: Flumazenil
description: flumazenil is used to reverse the effects of a benzodiazepine (benz-oh-dye-ayz-e-peen) sedative such as valium, versed, xanax, tranxene, and others.

name: Fluocinonide
description: fluocinonide is a potent corticosteroid that prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation.

name: Fluoxetine
description: fluoxetine is a prescription medicine used to treat major depressive disorder, bulimia nervosa (an eating disorder), obsessive-compulsive disorder, panic disorder, and premenstrual dysphoric disorder (pmdd).

name: Fluphenazine
description: fluphenazine is a phenothiazine (feen-oh-thye-a-zeen) antipsychotic medicine that is used to treat psychotic disorders such as schizophrenia.

name: Flutamide
description: flutamide capsules are used to treat prostate cancer.

name: Fluticasone and salmeterol
description: fluticasone and salmeterol inhalation is a steroid and bronchodilator combination medicine that is used to prevent asthma attacks. it is also used to prevent flare-ups or worsening of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (copd) associated with chronic bronchitis and/or emphysema.

name: Fluticasone nasal
description: fluticasone nasal (for the nose) is a steroid medicine that is used to treat nasal congestion, sneezing, runny nose, and itchy or watery eyes caused by seasonal or year-round allergies.

name: Fluvoxamine
description: fluvoxamine is used to treat symptoms of obsessive compulsive disorder (ocd) in adults and children at least 8 years old.

name: Focalin
description: focalin is a prescription medicine used to treat attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (adhd).

name: Focalin XR
description: focalin xr is a stimulant that is used to treat attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (adhd).

name: Folic Acid
description: as a medication, folic acid is used to treat folic acid deficiency and certain types of anemia (lack of red blood cells) caused by folic acid deficiency.

name: Formoterol
description: use of formoterol for treatment of asthma without concomitant use of long-term asthma controller therapy (e.g., inhaled corticosteroids) is contraindicated.  (see contraindications under cautions.)

name: Forteo
description: forteo is used to treat osteoporosis caused by menopause, steroid use, or gonadal failure.

name: Fosamax
description: fosamax is used in women to treat or prevent osteoporosis caused by menopause and in men and women to treat osteoporosis caused by taking steroids.

name: Fosfomycin
description: fosfomycin is an antibiotic that fights infection caused by bacteria.

name: Fosinopril
description: fosinopril is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) or heart failure.

name: Fulvestrant
description: fulvestrant was first approved by the fda in 2002 after phase 3 trials showed that the patients on fulvestrant took longer for their cancer to get worse, when compared to patients on arimidex (anastrozole). it is approved to be used for certain types of breast cancer in women, so your doctor will only prescribe it for you if it has been shown to be effective for your type of cancer.

name: Furosemide
description: furosemide is used to treat fluid retention (edema) in people with congestive heart failure, liver disease, or a kidney disorder such as nephrotic syndrome.

name: Fycompa
description: fycompa is an anticonvulsant used to treat seizures in adults and children.

name: Gabapentin
description: gabapentin (neurontin, gralise, horizant) is a medicine used to treat partial seizures, nerve pain from shingles and restless leg syndrome. it works on the chemical messengers in your brain and nerves.� gabapentin is from a group of medicines called anticonvulsants.�

name: Galantamine
description: galantamine is used to treat mild to moderate alzheimer's type dementia.

name: Ganciclovir
description: ganciclovir for injection, usp is indicated for the treatment of cytomegalovirus (cmv) retinitis in immunocompromised adult patients, including patients with acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (aids) [see clinical studies (14.1)].

name: Garlic
description: garlic is a commonly used food and flavoring agent. when used as a food product, garlic is not likely to produce health benefits or side effects. when used as a medicinal product, garlic may produce both desired and unwanted effects on the body.

name: Gas-X
description: gas-x is used to relieve painful pressure caused by excess gas in the stomach and intestines. this medicine is for use in babies, children, and adults.

name: GaviLyte G
description: gavilyte-g, supplied as a powder, must be reconstituted with water before its use; it is not for direct ingestion [see dosage and administration (2.2), warnings and precautions (5.8)]. the 4 liter reconstituted gavilyte-g solution contains: 236 grams of polyethylene glycol (peg) 3350, 22.74 grams sodium sulfate (anhydrous), 6.74 grams of sodium bicarbonate, 5.86 grams of sodium chloride, and 2.97 grams of potassium chloride. gavilyte-g is supplied with lemon flavor pack.

name: Gaviscon
description: gaviscon is a combination medicine that is used to treat heartburn, acid indigestion, sour stomach, or upset stomach.

name: Gavreto
description: gavreto is tyrosine kinase inhibitor and is used as an antineoplastic agent.

name: Gazyva
description: gazyva is used in combination with another cancer medicine called chlorambucil to treat chronic lymphocytic leukemia.

name: Gemcitabine
description: gemcitabine is used to treat cancers of the pancreas, lung, ovary, and breast.

name: Gemfibrozil
description: gemfibrozil is used together with diet to treat very high cholesterol and triglyceride levels in people with pancreatitis.

name: Gemtesa
description: gemtesa is used in adults to treat the symptoms of overactive bladder.

name: Gemzar
description: gemzar is used to treat cancers of the pancreas, lung, ovary, and breast.

name: Genotropin
description: genotropin is used to treat growth failure in children and adults who lack natural growth hormone. this includes people with short stature due to turner syndrome, prader-willi syndrome, short stature at birth with no catch-up growth, and other causes.

name: Gentamicin
description: gentamicin is used to treat severe or serious bacterial infections.

name: Genvoya
description: genvoya is a tablet containing a combination of cobicistat, elvitegravir, emtricitabine, and tenofovir. cobicistat reduces the action of enzymes in your liver that break down certain antiviral medicines. this allows the antiviral medicines to be used more safely and effectively at lower doses.

name: Geodon
description: geodon is used to treat schizophrenia and the manic symptoms of bipolar disorder (manic depression) in adults and children who are at least 10 years old. it is available as an oral (by mouth) treatment as an injection.

name: Giazo
description: the colazal brand of balsalazide is used to treat mild to moderate active ulcerative colitis in adults and children who are at least 5 years old.

name: Gilenya
description: gilenya is used to treat relapsing multiple sclerosis (ms) in adults, and children and adolescents aged 10 years and older.

name: Ginger
description: ginger has been used in alternative medicine as a possibly effective aid in treating nausea and vomiting after surgery, dizziness, menstrual pain, arthritis, preventing morning sickness.

name: Ginkgo Biloba
description: ginkgo biloba has been used in alternative medicine as a possibly effective aid in improving mental function or treating anxiety, dementia, leg pain caused by blood circulation problems, premenstrual symptoms, vision problems caused by glaucoma or diabetes, vertigo (dizziness), or a movement disorder (tardive dyskinesia) caused by taking certain antipsychotic drugs.

name: Ginseng
description: ginseng is used by some people as medicine. science does not support the use of this product for any health problem.

name: Gleevec
description: gleevec is used to treat certain types of leukemia (blood cancer), bone marrow disorders, and skin cancer.

name: Glimepiride
description: glimepiride is an oral diabetes medicine that is used together with diet and exercise to improve blood sugar control in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus.  glimepiride is not for treating type 1 diabetes.

name: Glipizide
description: glipizide is used together with diet and exercise to improve blood sugar control in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus.

name: Glucagon
description: glucagon injection is a prescription medicine used to treat very low blood sugar (hypoglycemia).

name: Glucophage
description: glucophage is used together with diet and exercise to improve blood sugar control in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus.

name: Glucophage XR
description: glucophage xr is used together with diet and exercise to improve blood sugar control in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus.

name: Glucosamine
description: glucosamine has been used in alternative medicine as an aid to relieving joint pain, swelling, and stiffness caused by arthritis.

name: Glucosamine & Chondroitin with MSM
description: chondroitin, glucosamine, and msm is a combination medicine that has been used in alternative medicine as a possibly effective aid in treating osteoarthritis, muscle damage caused by exercise, and other inflammatory joint disorders.

name: Glucose
description: glucose is used to treat very low blood sugar (hypoglycemia), most often in people with diabetes mellitus.  glucose works by quickly increasing the amount of glucose in your blood.

name: Glucotrol
description: glucotrol is used together with diet and exercise to improve blood sugar control in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus.

name: Glutathione
description: glutathione is used by some people as medicine. science does not support the use of this product for any health problem.

name: Glyburide
description: glyburide is used together with diet and exercise to improve blood sugar control in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus.

name: Glycerin
description: glycerin , when taken by mouth, is used to treat certain conditions in which there is increased eye pressure, such as glaucoma. it may also be used before eye surgery to reduce pressure in the eye.

name: Glycopyrrolate
description: glycopyrrolate is also used to reduce drooling in children ages 3 to 16 who have certain medical conditions, such as cerebral palsy.

name: Glyxambi
description: glyxambi is used together with diet and exercise to improve blood sugar control in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus.

name: Gocovri
description: gocovri is used to treat dyskinesia (sudden uncontrolled movements) in people with parkinson's disease who are treated with levodopa or levodopa plus other medicines that increase the effects of dopamine in the brain.

name: GoLYTELY
description: golytely is used to clean the bowel before colonoscopy, a barium x-ray, or other intestinal procedures.

name: Goserelin
description: synthetic analog of gonadotropin-releasing hormone (gnrh, luteinizing hormone-releasing hormone, gonadorelin); used as an antineoplastic agent and for its endocrine effects.

name: Granisetron
description: granisetron blocks the actions of chemicals in the body that can trigger nausea and vomiting.

name: Griseofulvin
description: griseofulvin is an antifungal medicine that is used to treat infections such as ringworm, athlete's foot, jock itch, and fungal infections of the scalp, fingernails, or toenails.

name: Guaifenesin
description: guaifenesin is an ingredient in cough and cold medicines that is used to help clear mucus or phlegm from your chest when you have had a cold or flu. guaifenesin works by making your mucus thinner and easier to cough up, which helps clear chest congestion. guaifenesin is available as an over-the-counter (otc) medicine and also available on prescription.

name: Guanfacine
description: guanfacine is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension). it is sometimes given with other blood pressure medications.

name: Gvoke HypoPen
description: gvoke is used to treat hypoglycemia (low blood sugar). gvoke in the hypopen auto-injector, pre-filled syringe (pfs), and the vial and syringe kit is given by subcutaneous (under the skin) injection.

name: Haegarda
description: haegarda is a man-made form of a protein in blood that helps control swelling in the body. people with a condition called hereditary angioedema (hae) do not have enough of this protein. hereditary angioedema can cause attacks of swelling and symptoms such as stomach problems or trouble breathing.

name: Halcion
description: halcion is a benzodiazepine (ben-zoe-dye-aze-eh-peen) that is used short term (7 to 10 days) to treat insomnia (trouble falling or staying asleep).

name: Haldol
description: haldol is an antipsychotic medicine that is used to treat schizophrenia.

name: Halobetasol
description: halobetasol topical (for the skin) is used to treat inflammation and itching caused by plaque psoriasis or other inflamed and itchy skin conditions that respond to corticosteroid medication.

name: Haloperidol
description: haloperidol is an antipsychotic medicine that is used to treat schizophrenia.

name: Harvoni
description: harvoni treats specific genotypes of hepatitis c, and only in certain people. use only the medications prescribed for you. do not share your medicine with other people.

name: Hemabate
description: hemabate is used to treat severe bleeding after childbirth (postpartum).

name: Heparin
description: heparin is used to treat and prevent blood clots caused by certain medical conditions or medical procedures. it is also used before surgery to reduce the risk of blood clots.

name: Hepatitis B adult vaccine
description: hepatitis b is a serious disease caused by a virus. hepatitis causes inflammation of the liver, vomiting, and jaundice (yellowing of the skin or eyes). hepatitis can lead to liver cancer, cirrhosis, or death.

name: Herceptin
description: herceptin is a cancer medicine that interferes with the growth and spread of cancer cells in the body. herceptin is used to treat certain types of breast cancer or stomach cancer. other cancer medicines are sometimes used in combination with herceptin.

name: Hiprex
description: hiprex is an antibacterial medicine used to treat or prevent bladder infections in adults and children at least 6 years old.

name: Histrelin
description: histrelin overstimulates the body's own production of certain hormones, which causes that production to shut down temporarily.

name: Hizentra
description: hizentra subcutaneous injection(for injection under the skin) is used to treat primary immunodeficiency diseases. this includes, but is not limited to, the humoral immune defect in congenital agammaglobulinemia, common variable immunodeficiency, x-linked agammaglobulinemia, wiskott-aldrich syndrome, and severe combined immunodeficiencies.

name: Horizant
description: horizant is a prescription medicine used to treat adults with restless legs syndrome and pain from damaged nerves. it affects chemicals and nerves in the body that are involved in the cause of some types of pain.

name: Humalog
description: humalog is used to improve blood sugar control in adults and children with diabetes mellitus.

name: Humira
description: humira is a tumor necrosis factor (tnf) blocker that reduces the effects of a substance in the body that can cause inflammation.

name: Humulin N
description: humulin n is used to improve blood sugar control in adults and children with diabetes mellitus.

name: Humulin R
description: humulin r is used to improve blood sugar control in adults and children with diabetes mellitus.

name: Humulin RU 500
description: u-500 insulin is used to improve blood sugar control in adults and children with diabetes mellitus who have significant daily insulin needs (more than 200 units per day).

name: Hycodan
description: cough/cold combinations are used mainly to relieve the cough due to colds, influenza, or hay fever. they are not to be used for the chronic cough that occurs with smoking, asthma, or emphysema or when there is an unusually large amount of mucus or phlegm (pronounced flem) with the cough.

name: Hydralazine
description: hydralazine is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension).

name: Hydrea
description: hydrea is used to treat chronic myeloid leukemia, ovarian cancer, and certain types of skin cancer (squamous cell cancer of the head and neck).

name: Hydrochlorothiazide
description: hydrochlorothiazide is a thiazide diuretic (water pill) that helps prevent your body from absorbing too much salt, which can cause fluid retention.

name: Hydrochlorothiazide and irbesartan
description: hydrochlorothiazide and irbesartan is a combination medicine used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension).

name: Hydrochlorothiazide and lisinopril
description: hydrochlorothiazide and lisinopril is a combination medicine used to treat hypertension (high blood pressure). lowering blood pressure may lower your risk of a stroke or heart attack.

name: Hydrochlorothiazide and losartan
description: hydrochlorothiazide and losartan is a combination medicine used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension). it is also used to lower the risk of stroke in certain people with heart disease.

name: Hydrochlorothiazide and olmesartan
description: hydrochlorothiazide and olmesartan is a combination medicine used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension). lowering blood pressure may lower your risk of a stroke or heart attack.

name: Hydrochlorothiazide and triamterene
description: hydrochlorothiazide and triamterene is a combination medicine that is used to treat fluid retention (edema) and high blood pressure (hypertension).

name: Hydrochlorothiazide and valsartan
description: hydrochlorothiazide and valsartan is a combination medicine used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension). lowering blood pressure may lower your risk of a stroke or heart attack.

name: Hydrocodone
description: zohydro er and hysingla er are extended-release forms of hydrocodone that are used for around-the-clock treatment of severe pain.

name: Hydrocodone and acetaminophen
description: hydrocodone bitartrate and acetaminophen oral solution has the potential for addiction, abuse, and misuse, which can lead to overdose and death. assess each patient's risk before prescribing, and monitor for development of these behaviors and conditions. to ensure that the benefits of opioid analgesics outweigh the risks of addiction, abuse, and misuse, the food and drug administration (fda) has required a risk evaluation and mitigation strategy (rems) for these products. serious, life-threatening, or fatal respiratory depression may occur. monitor closely, especially upon initiation or following a dose increase. accidental ingestion of hydrocodone bitartrate and acetaminophen oral solution, especially by children, can result in a fatal overdose of hydrocodone bitartrate and acetaminophen. prolonged use of hydrocodone bitartrate and acetaminophen oral solution during pregnancy can result in neonatal opioid withdrawal syndrome, which may be life-threatening if not recognized and treated. monitor patients receiving hydrocodone bitartrate and acetaminophen oral solution and any cyp3a4 inhibitor or inducer for signs of respiratory depression or sedation. acetaminophen has been associated with cases of acute liver failure, at times resulting in liver transplant and death, most often with the use of acetaminophen at doses that exceed 4000 mg/day, and involving more than 1 acetaminophen-containing product. concomitant use of benzodiazepines and opioids may result in profound sedation, respiratory depression, coma, and death. reserve concomitant prescribing for patients with inadequate alternative treatment options. limit dosages and durations to the minimum required and follow patients for signs and symptoms of respiratory depression and sedation .

name: Hydrocodone and ibuprofen
description: hydrocodone is an opioid pain medicine. ibuprofen is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (nsaid). this combination medicine is used short-term to relieve severe pain.

name: Hydrocortisone
