name: Ultomiris
description: ultomiris injection is used to treat paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria (pnh) in adults and children who are at least 1 month old.

name: Ultracet
description: ultracet is used to treat moderate to severe pain.

name: Ultram
description: ultram is used to treat moderate to severe pain in adults.

name: Ultram ER
description: ultram er is an pain medicine similar to an opioid. this medicine is used to treat moderate to severe pain.

name: Ultravate
description: ultravate (for the skin) is used to treat inflammation and itching caused by plaque psoriasis or skin conditions that respond to steroid medication.

name: Ultravist
description: inadvertent intrathecal administration may cause death, convulsions, cerebral hemorrhage, coma, paralysis, arachnoiditis, acute renal failure, cardiac arrest, seizures, rhabdomyolysis, hyperthermia, and brain edema .

name: Umbralisib
description: umbralisib is used to treat certain types of lymphoma in adults.

name: Umeclidinium
description: umeclidinium is used to prevent airflow obstruction and reduce flare-ups in adults with copd (chronic obstructive pulmonary disease), including bronchitis and emphysema.

name: Umeclidinium and vilanterol
description: umeclidinium and vilanterol is a combination medicine used to prevent airflow obstruction and reduce flare-ups in adults with copd (chronic obstructive pulmonary disease), including bronchitis and emphysema.

name: Unasyn
description: unasyn is a combination medicine used to treat many different types of infections caused by bacteria.

name: Unisom
description: unisom is an antihistamine that reduces the effects of natural chemical histamine in the body. histamine can produce symptoms of sneezing, itching, watery eyes, and runny nose. antihistamines can cause drowsiness and are sometimes used a sleep aids.

name: Unisom Sleep Gels
description: unisom sleep gels is an antihistamine that is used to treat sneezing, runny nose, watery eyes, hives, skin rash, itching, and other cold or allergy symptoms.

name: Unithroid
description: thyroid hormones, including levothyroxine, should not be used either alone or with other therapeutic agents for the treatment of obesity or weight loss. in euthyroid patients, doses within the range of daily hormonal requirements are ineffective for weight reduction. larger doses may produce serious or even life-threatening manifestations of toxicity, particularly when given in association with sympathomimetic amines such as those used for their anorectic effects .

name: Univasc
description: univasc is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension).

name: Upadacitinib
description: upadacitinib is a slow release tablet used to treat certain autoimmune disorders. it was first approved by the fda in 2019 for rheumatoid arthritis and since then has been approved for types of psoriatic arthritis, eczema and ulcerative colitis.

name: Uplizna
description: uplizna may cause serious side effects, including:infusion reactions. uplizna can cause infusion reactions that can be serious or may cause you to be hospitalized. you will be monitored during your infusion and for at least 1 hour after each infusion of uplizna for signs and symptoms of an infusion reaction. tell your healthcare provider right away if you get any of these symptoms:

name: Upneeq
description: upneeq is a prescription version of oxymetazoline ophthalmic that is used to treat blepharoptosis, a condition that causes a droopy eyelid over one or both eyes. upneeq is for use in adults and children at least 13 years old.

name: Uptravi
description: uptravi is used to treat pulmonary arterial hypertension (pah).

name: Urea Cream
description: urea cream 41% rx only for external use only. not for ophthalmic use.

name: Urecholine
description: urecholine is used to treat urinary retention (trouble urinating) that may be caused by surgery, delivering a baby, or other conditions.

name: Urelle
description: urelle is a combination medicine used to treat bladder irritation (pain, spasms, inflammation) caused by urinary tract infection.  urelle is also used to prevent bladder discomfort during a medical procedure.

name: Uribel
description: uribel is a combination medicine used to treat bladder irritation (pain, spasms, inflammation) caused by urinary tract infection.  uribel is also used to prevent bladder discomfort during a medical procedure.

name: Urised
description: atropine , hyoscyamine , methenamine , methylene blue, phenyl salicylate , and benzoic acid combination medicine is an anticholinergic, anti-infective, and analgesic. it is given by mouth to help relieve the discomfort caused by urinary tract infections; however, it will not cure the infection itself. this combination medicine may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.

name: Urispas
description: urispas is used to treat bladder symptoms such as painful urination, frequent or urgent urination, increased night-time urination, bladder pain, and incontinence (urine leakage). these bladder symptoms are often caused by overactive bladder, prostate enlargement, bladder infections, or irritation of the urethra.

name: Urocit-K
description: urocit-k is a mineral that is used to treat kidney stones.

name: Urogesic-Blue
description: urogesic-blue is a combination medicine used to treat bladder irritation (pain, burning, inflammation) caused by urinary tract infection.  urogesic-blue is also used to prevent bladder discomfort during a medical procedure.

name: Urokinase
description: urokinase is used to treat blood clots in the lungs.

name: Uroxatral
description: uroxatral is used to improve urination in men with benign prostatic hyperplasia (enlarged prostate).

name: Urso
description: urso capsules are used to dissolve small gallstones that cannot be removed with surgery, or to prevent gallstones that may occur during rapid weight loss. this medicine will not dissolve calcified gallstones.

name: Urso Forte
description: urso forte capsules are used to dissolve small gallstones that cannot be removed with surgery, or to prevent gallstones that may occur during rapid weight loss. this medicine will not dissolve calcified gallstones.

name: Ursodiol
description: ursodiol capsules are used to dissolve small gallstones that cannot be removed with surgery, or to prevent gallstones that may occur during rapid weight loss. ursodiol will not dissolve calcified gallstones.

name: Ustekinumab
description: ustekinumab is a biologic drug that was originally approved by the fda in 2009 to treat moderate to severe plaque psoriasis. ustekinumab was developed by janssen biotech inc., and is manufactured by johnson & johnson.

name: Valacyclovir
description: valacyclovir is used to treat infections caused by herpes viruses, including genital herpes, cold sores, and shingles (herpes zoster) in adults.

name: Valium
description: valium is used to treat anxiety disorders, or alcohol withdrawal symptoms.

name: Valproic acid
description: valproic acid is used to treat various types of seizure disorders. valproic acid is sometimes used together with other seizure medications.

name: Valsartan
description: valsartan is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) in adults and children who are at least 1 year old. lowering blood pressure may lower your risk of a stroke or heart attack.

name: Valtoco
description: valtoco is a benzodiazepine (ben-zoe-dye-aze-eh-peen) that is used to treat seizure clusters in adults and children at least 6 years old.

name: Valtrex
description: valtrex is used to treat infections caused by herpes viruses, including genital herpes, cold sores, and shingles (herpes zoster) in adults.

name: Vancomycin
description: vancomycin is used to treat an infection of the intestines caused by clostridium difficile, which can cause watery or bloody diarrhea. this medicine is also used to treat staph infections that can cause inflammation of the colon and small intestines.

name: Vanos
description: fluocinonide is a potent steroid that prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation.

name: Varenicline
description: varenicline is a smoking cessation medicine. it is used together with behavior modification and counseling support to help you stop smoking.

name: Vascepa
description: vascepa is used together with other medicines (such as statins) to reduce the risk of heart attack, stroke, and some types of heart problems that need hospitalization in adults.

name: Vasotec
description: vasotec is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) in adults and children who are at least 1 month old.

name: Velcade
description: velcade is used to treat multiple myeloma and mantle cell lymphoma.

name: Venclexta
description: venclexta is a prescription medicine used to treat chronic lymphocytic leukemia (cll) or small lymphocytic leukemia (sll) in adults with or without 17p deletion (a specific genetic marker). venetoclax is sometimes used in combination with rituximab to treat these conditions.

name: Venlafaxine
description: venlafaxine is a prescription medicine used to treat major depressive disorder, anxiety, and panic disorder.

name: Venofer
description: venofer is used to treat iron deficiency anemia in people with kidney disease.

name: Ventolin
description: albuterol is used to treat bronchospasm or wheezing in patients with reversible obstructive airway disease, such as asthma.

name: Ventolin HFA
description: ventolin hfa is used to treat or prevent bronchospasm, or narrowing of the airways in the lungs, in people with asthma or certain types of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (copd). it is also used to prevent exercise-induced bronchospasm.

name: Verapamil
description: verapamil is used to treat hypertension (high blood pressure), angina (chest pain), and certain heart rhythm disorders.

name: Versed
description: versed is a benzodiazepine (ben-zoe-dye-aze-eh-peen) that is used to help you relax before having a minor surgery, dental work, or other medical procedure.

name: Verzenio
description: verzenio is a prescription medicine used to treat certain patients with hr-positive, her2-negative breast cancer.

name: VESIcare
description: vesicare is a prescription medicine used to treat symptoms of overactive bladder, such as frequent or urgent urination, and incontinence (urine leakage).

name: Viagra
description: viagra is used to treat erectile dysfunction (impotence) in men. another brand of sildenafil is revatio, which is used to treat pulmonary arterial hypertension and improve exercise capacity in men and women. this page contains specific information for viagra, not revatio.

name: Vibramycin
description: to reduce the development of drug-resistant bacteria and maintain the effectiveness of vibramycin� and other antibacterial drugs, vibramycin should be used only to treat or prevent infections that are proven or strongly suspected to be caused by bacteria.

name: Vicodin
description: vicodin tablets are used for the relief of moderate to moderately severe pain.

name: Victoza
description: victoza is used together with diet and exercise to improve blood sugar control in adults and children 10 years of age and older with type 2 diabetes mellitus.

name: Viibryd
description: viibryd is used to treat major depressive disorder (mdd).

name: Vilazodone
description: vilazodone is an antidepressant that is used to treat major depressive disorder (mdd).

name: Vimpat
description: vimpat is used to treat partial-onset seizures in adults and children who are at least 1 month of age.

name: Vistaril
description: vistaril is used as a sedative to treat anxiety and tension. it is also used together with other medications given during and after general anesthesia.

name: Vitamin A

name: Vitamin B12
description: treatment of pernicious anemia and other vitamin b12 deficiency states.

name: Vitamin B6
description: pyridoxine is used to treat or prevent vitamin b6 deficiency. it is also used to treat a certain type of anemia (lack of red blood cells). pyridoxine injection is also used to treat some types of seizure in babies.

name: Vitamin C
description: ascorbic acid is used to treat and prevent vitamin c deficiency.

name: Vitamin D
description: vitamin d2 and d3 are two important forms of vitamin d. d2 comes from plants and d3 comes from mainly animal sources or it is made by our bodies when our skin is exposed to sunlight. d3 is better absorbed and more potent than d2. fortified milk or juice is more likely to contain d2 because it is cheaper to produce.

name: Vitamin D3
description: cholecalciferol is used as a dietary supplement in people who do not get enough vitamin d in their diets to maintain adequate health.

name: Vitamin E
description: vitamin e is used to treat or prevent vitamin e deficiency. people with certain diseases may need extra vitamin e.

name: Vivitrol

name: Voltaren Arthritis Pain Gel
description: voltaren arthritis pain gel contains diclofenac, a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (nsaid). diclofenac works by reducing substances in the body that cause pain and inflammation.

name: Voriconazole

name: Vortioxetine

name: Vosevi

name: Votrient

name: Vyepti

name: Vyndamax

name: Vytorin

name: Wakix

name: Wal-itin

name: Welchol
description: welchol is used to treat high cholesterol in adults and children at least 10 years old.

name: Welireg

name: Wellbaby DHA
description: do not use if the bottle seal is broken on purchase. use the dropper provided.

name: Wellbutrin

name: Wellbutrin SR

name: Wellbutrin XL
description: wellbutrin xl is an antidepressant used to treat major depressive disorder and seasonal affective disorder. the zyban brand of bupropion is used to help people stop smoking by reducing cravings and other withdrawal effects.

name: Wera

name: White Mulberry

name: Willow Bark

name: Witch Hazel

name: Witch hazel topical

name: Wixela Inhub
description: wixela inhub� is indicated for the twice-daily treatment of asthma in patients aged 4 years and older. wixela inhub� should be used for patients not adequately controlled on a long-term asthma control medication such as an inhaled corticosteroid (ics) or whose disease warrants initiation of treatment with both an ics and long-acting beta2-adrenergic agonist (laba).

name: Wormwood

name: Wynzora

name: Xarelto

name: Xelpros
description: xelpros (for the eyes) is used to treat certain types of glaucoma and other causes of high pressure inside the eye.

name: Xenical

name: Xenleta
description: lefamulin is used to treat community-acquired bacterial pneumonia (cabp).

name: Xeomin

name: Xifaxan

name: Xigduo XR

name: Xiidra

name: Xofigo
description: treatment for: advanced prostate cancer

name: Xofluza

name: Xolair
description: xolair is used to treat moderate to severe asthma that is caused by allergies in adults and children who are at least 6 years old. xolair is used when asthma symptoms are not controlled by asthma inhaled steroid medicine. it is not a rescue medicine for treating an asthma attack.

name: Xopenex
description: xopenex inhalation is used to treat or prevent bronchospasm in people with reversible obstructive airway disease.

name: Xopenex HFA
description: xopenex hfa is used to treat or prevent asthma attacks in adults and children who are at least 4 years old.

name: Xospata
description: xospata is a prescription medicine used to treat acute myeloid leukemia (aml) in adults with an abnormal flt3 gene. your doctor will test you for this gene.

name: Xpovio
description: xpovio is used together with bortezomib and/or dexamethasone to treat multiple myeloma in adults. it is used:

name: Xtandi
description: xtandi is used to treat prostate cancer

name: Xulane

name: Xultophy
description: xultophy is used to lower blood sugar in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus. this medicine should be used together with diet and exercise.

name: Xylitol

name: Xylocaine
description: xylocaine (lidocaine hcl) injections are sterile, nonpyrogenic, aqueous solutions that contain a local anesthetic agent with or without epinephrine and are administered parenterally by injection. see indications and usage section for specific uses.

name: Xylocaine Jelly
description: xylocaine (lidocaine hcl) 2% jelly is a sterile aqueous product that contains a local anesthetic agent and is administered topically (see indications and usage for specific uses).

name: Xyntha
description: xyntha contains recombinant antihemophilic factor. antihemophilic factor is a naturally occurring protein in the blood that helps blood to clot. a lack of antihemophilic factor viii is the cause of hemophilia a.

name: Xyosted
description: xyosted is a prescription medicine used as a hormone replacement therapy in adult men who have low or no testosterone due to certain medical conditions.

name: Xyrem
description: xyrem is a central nervous system depressant. it is used to treat cataplexy (sudden loss of muscle strength) and reduce daytime sleepiness caused by narcolepsy in adults and children at least 7 years old.

name: Xywav
description: xywav is used to treat cataplexy (sudden loss of muscle strength) or to reduce daytime sleepiness caused by narcolepsy. for these conditions, xywav is for use in adults and children at least 7 years old.

name: Xyzal
description: xyzal is used to treat symptoms of year-round (perennial) allergies in children who are at least 6 months old.

name: Yarrow
description: traditionally, yarrow herb 4.5 g/day has been used for various conditions. however, there are no quality clinical studies to validate this dosing.

name: Yasmin
description: yasmin also causes changes in your cervical mucus and uterine lining, making it harder for sperm to reach the uterus and harder for a fertilized egg to attach to the uterus.

name: Yaz
description: yaz tablets contain a combination of progesterone (drospirenone) and estrogen (ethinyl estradiol). yaz is a combination birth control pill containing female hormones that prevent ovulation (the release of an egg from an ovary). yaz also causes changes in your cervical mucus and uterine lining, making it harder for sperm to reach the uterus and harder for a fertilized egg to attach to the uterus.

name: Yaz 28
description: cigarette smoking increases the risk of serious cardiovascular events from oral contraceptive use. this risk increases with age, particularly in women over 35 years of age, and with the number of cigarettes smoked. women who are over 35 years of age and smoke should not use oral contraceptives .

name: Yellow fever vaccine
description: this vaccine is used to help prevent yellow fever in adults and children who are at least 9 months old. the vaccine works by exposing you to a small dose of the virus, which causes the body to develop immunity to the disease. this vaccine will not treat an active infection that has already developed in the body.

name: Yervoy
description: yervoy is a cancer medicine that is used alone or in combination with other medicines to treat certain types of cancer such as:

name: Yescarta
description: yescarta is an immunotherapy medicine used to treat large b-cell lymphoma when your first treatment did not work or your cancer returned within a year of first treatment, or when at least two kinds of treatment have failed to control your cancer.

name: Yohimbe
description: no information from medical studies supports the use of this product for any health problem.

name: Yohimbine
description: yohimbine is used to increase peripheral blood flow. it is also used to dilate the pupil of the eye.

name: Yondelis
description: yondelis is used to treat liposarcoma, a rare type of cancer that grows in fatty tissues of the body.

name: Yonsa
description: yonsa is used together with a steroid medicine (prednisone or methylprednisolone) to treat prostate cancer that has spread to other parts of the body (metastatic) and cannot be treated with surgery or other medicines.

name: Yupelri
description: yupelri is a prescription medicine used to treat chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (copd), including emphysema and chronic bronchitis.

name: Yuvafem
description: there is an increased risk of endometrial cancer in a woman with a uterus who uses unopposed estrogens. adding a progestin to estrogen therapy has been shown to reduce the risk of endometrial hyperplasia, which may be a precursor to endometrial cancer. adequate diagnostic measures, including directed or random endometrial sampling when indicated, should be undertaken to rule out malignancy in postmenopausal women with undiagnosed persistent or recurring abnormal genital bleeding [see warnings and precautions (5.3)].

name: Zaditor
description: zaditor (for use in the eyes) is used to treat itching of the eyes caused by allergy to dust, pollen, animals, or other allergens.

name: Zafirlukast
description: zafirlukast is a leukotriene (loo-koe-try-een) inhibitor that is used to prevent asthma attacks in adults and children as young as 5 years old.

name: Zaleplon
description: zaleplon is a sedative that is used to treat insomnia.  zaleplon causes relaxation to help you fall asleep and stay asleep.

name: Zanaflex
description: zanaflex is used to treat spasticity associated with diseases like multiple sclerosis and spinal cord injuries by temporarily relaxing muscle tone.

name: Zantac
description: zantac has been used to treat and prevent ulcers in the stomach and intestines. it also was used to treat conditions in which the stomach produces too much acid, such as zollinger-ellison syndrome..

name: Zarxio
description: the united states food and drug administration (fda) has approved zarxio (filgrastim-sndz), a leukocyte growth factor biosimilar to the reference product neupogen. it is indicated for the treatment of neutropenia associated with chemotherapy and all other indications included in the reference product's label.

name: Zegalogue
description: zegalogue is a prescription medicine used to treat very low blood sugar (severe hypoglycemia) in people with diabetes aged 6 years and older.

name: Zejula
description: zejula is used as a maintenance treatment to keep certain types of cancer from coming back. this includes ovarian cancer, fallopian tube cancer, or peritoneal cancer (the peritoneum is the membrane that lines the inside of your abdomen and covers some of your internal organs).

name: Zenpep
description: zenpep is used to replace these enzymes when the body does not have enough of its own. certain medical conditions can cause this lack of enzymes, including cystic fibrosis, chronic inflammation of the pancreas, or blockage of the pancreatic ducts.

name: Zeposia
description: zeposia is a prescription medicine used to treat:

name: Zestoretic
description: zestoretic contains a combination of hydrochlorothiazide and lisinopril. hydrochlorothiazide is a thiazide diuretic (water pill) that helps prevent your body from absorbing too much salt, which can cause fluid retention.

name: Zestril
description: zestril is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) in adults and children who are at least 6 years old.

name: Zetia
description: zetia reduces the level of total cholesterol and ldl (bad) cholesterol in the blood. zetia is used to treat high cholesterol in people who cannot control their cholesterol levels by diet and exercise alone.

name: Ziac
description: ziac is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension).

name: Zidovudine
description: zidovudine has been associated with hematologic toxicity, including neutropenia and severe anemia, particularly in patients with advanced hiv disease. prolonged use of zidovudine has been associated with symptomatic myopathy. lactic acidosis and severe hepatomegaly with steatosis, including fatal cases, have been reported. suspend treatment if clinical or laboratory findings suggestive of lactic acidosis or pronounced hepatotoxicity occur .

name: Zinc
description: zinc is used to treat and to prevent zinc deficiency.

name: Zinc sulfate
description: zinc sulfate is used to treat and to prevent zinc deficiency.

name: Ziprasidone
description: ziprasidone oral is used to treat schizophrenia and the manic symptoms of bipolar disorder (manic depression).

name: Zithromax
description: zithromax is used to treat many different types of infections caused by bacteria, such as respiratory infections, skin infections, ear infections, and sexually transmitted diseases.

name: Zocor
description: zocor is used to lower blood levels of 'bad' cholesterol (low-density lipoprotein, or ldl), to increase levels of 'good' cholesterol (high-density lipoprotein, or hdl), and to lower triglycerides (a type of fat in the blood).

name: Zofran
description: zofran blocks the actions of chemicals in the body that can trigger nausea and vomiting.

name: Zofran ODT
description: zofran odt blocks the actions of chemicals in the body that can trigger nausea and vomiting.

name: Zoladex
description: zoladex is a man-made form of a hormone that regulates many processes in the body. goserelin overstimulates the body's own production of certain hormones, which causes that production to shut down temporarily.

name: Zoledronic acid
description: reclast is used to treat or prevent osteoporosis caused by menopause, or steroid use.  zoledronic acid also increases bone mass in men with osteoporosis. reclast is for use when you have a high risk of bone fracture.

name: Zolmitriptan
description: zolmitriptan is a headache medicine that narrows blood vessels around the brain. zolmitriptan also reduces substances in the body that can trigger headache pain, nausea, sensitivity to light and sound, and other migraine symptoms.

name: Zoloft
description: zoloft is an antidepressant that belongs to a group of drugs called selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (ssris), which works by balancing serotonin levels in the brain and nerves.� zoloft is used to treat some types of depression, premenstrual dysphoric disorder (pmdd), social anxiety disorder (sad), obsessive-compulsive disorder (ocd), panic disorder (pd), and post traumatic stress disorder (ptsd).

name: Zolpidem
description: zolpidem is used to treat insomnia. the immediate-release forms are ambien, intermezzo, edluar, and zolpimist, which are used to help you fall asleep. the extended-release form of zolpidem is ambien cr which has a first layer that dissolves quickly to help you fall asleep, and a second layer that dissolves slowly to help you stay asleep.

name: Zometa
description: zometa is used to treat high blood levels of calcium caused by cancer (also called hypercalcemia of malignancy). this medicine also treats multiple myeloma (a type of bone marrow cancer) or bone cancer that has spread from elsewhere in the body.

name: Zomig
description: zomig is a headache medicine that narrows blood vessels around the brain. zolmitriptan also reduces substances in the body that can trigger headache pain, nausea, sensitivity to light and sound, and other migraine symptoms.

name: Zonegran
description: zonegran is a prescription medicine used together with other medicines to treat partial partial seizures in adults with epilepsy.

name: Zonisamide
description: zonisamide is used together with other medicines to treat partial seizures in adults and teenagers at least 16 years old.

name: Zopiclone
description: zopiclone is a medication used to treat a sleeping problem called insomnia. zopiclone is a sleeping pill that belongs to a group of drugs called non-benzodiazepine hypnotics. it has a different structure to benzodiazepine sedative hypnotics, such as halcion (triazolam), but has similar benefits and side effects.

name: Zosyn
description: zosyn is used to treat many different infections caused by bacteria, such as stomach infections, skin infections, pneumonia, and severe uterine infections.

name: Zovirax
description: zovirax is used to treat infections caused by herpes viruses, such as genital herpes, cold sores, shingles, and chickenpox.

name: Zydelig
description: zydelig is used together with rituximab (rituxan) to treat chronic lymphocytic leukemia, and certain types of lymphoma.

name: Zykadia
description: zykadia is used to treat non-small cell lung cancer that has spread to other parts of the body.

name: Zyloprim
description: allopurinol is used to prevent or lower high uric acid levels in the blood. it is also used to prevent or lower excess uric acid levels caused by cancer medicines or in patients with kidney stones. a high uric acid level can cause gout or gouty arthritis (joint pain and inflammation). allopurinol is a xanthine oxidase inhibitor that works by decreasing the uric acid produced by the body.

name: Zyprexa
description: zyprexa is used to treat psychotic conditions such as schizophrenia and bipolar disorder (manic depression) in adults and children at least 13 years old.

name: Zyrtec
description: zyrtec is used in adults and children to treat cold or allergy symptoms such as sneezing, itching, watery eyes, or runny nose.

name: Zyrtec-D
description: pseudoephedrine is a decongestant that shrinks blood vessels in the nasal passages. dilated blood vessels can cause nasal congestion (stuffy nose).

name: Zytiga
description: zytiga is used together with steroid medication (prednisone or methylprednisolone) to treat prostate cancer that has spread to other parts of the body.

name: Zyvox
description: zyvox is used to treat different types of bacterial infections, such as pneumonia, skin infections, and infections that are resistant to other antibiotics.

name: ZzzQuil
description: zzzquil is used as a sleep-aid for the relief of occasional sleeplessness, and to reduce the time it takes to fall asleep if you have difficulty falling asleep.
